  • Method Details

    • loadAudioClip

      void loadAudioClip(AudioClip audioClip, AudioPlayer audioPlayer, MultiThread multiThread, YldB yldB)
      Loads an audio clip into an audio player
      Parameters:
      audioClip - The AudioClip to load.
      audioPlayer - The AudioPlayer object that will play the audio clip.
      multiThread - The MultiThread object that will be used to load the audio clip.
      yldB - The YldB object that contains concurrent information.

    • setMicrosecondPosition

      void setMicrosecondPosition(AudioPlayer audioPlayer, long pos)
      Sets an audioPlayer position in microseconds.
      Parameters:
      audioPlayer - The AudioPlayer object that you want to set the position of.
      pos - The position in microseconds to set the position to.

    • getMicrosecondPosition

      long getMicrosecondPosition(AudioPlayer audioPlayer)
      It returns the current position of an audio player in microseconds.
      Parameters:
      audioPlayer - The AudioPlayer object that you want to get the position of.
      Returns:
      The current position of the audio player in microseconds.

    • getMicrosecondLength

      long getMicrosecondLength(AudioPlayer audioPlayer)
      It returns the length of the audio player in microseconds
      Parameters:
      audioPlayer - The AudioPlayer object that you want to get the length of.
      Returns:
      The length of the audio file in microseconds.

    • getVolume

      float getVolume(AudioPlayer audioPlayer)
      Get the volume of the audio player.
      Parameters:
      audioPlayer - The AudioPlayer object that you want to get the volume of.
      Returns:
      The volume of the audio player.

    • setVolume

      void setVolume(AudioPlayer audioPlayer, float value)
      Set the volume of the audio player to the given value.
      Parameters:
      audioPlayer - The AudioPlayer object that you want to set the volume of.
      value - The volume to set the audio player to.

    • pausePlayer

      void pausePlayer(AudioPlayer audioPlayer)
      Pause the audio player.
      Parameters:
      audioPlayer - The audio player object that you want to pause.

    • resumePlayer

      void resumePlayer(AudioPlayer audioPlayer)
      Resumes the audio player
      Parameters:
      audioPlayer - The AudioPlayer object that you want to resume.

    • flushPlayer

      void flushPlayer(AudioPlayer audioPlayer)
      Flushes the audio player
      Parameters:
      audioPlayer - The audio player to flush.

    • setLoop

      void setLoop(AudioPlayer audioPlayer, boolean loop)
      Sets whether the audio player should loop or not
      Parameters:
      audioPlayer - The AudioPlayer object that you want to set the looping for.
      loop - true or false

    • setLoop

      void setLoop(AudioPlayer audioPlayer, int count)
      Sets the number of times the audio should loop
      Parameters:
      audioPlayer - The AudioPlayer object that you want to set the loop count for.
      count - The number of times the audio should loop.

    • isPlayerRunning

      boolean isPlayerRunning(AudioPlayer audioPlayer)
      Returns true if the player is running, false otherwise
      Parameters:
      audioPlayer - The AudioPlayer object that you want to check.
      Returns:
      A boolean value.

    • loadAudioPlayer

      void loadAudioPlayer(AudioPlayer player)
      Loads the audio player.
      Parameters:
      player - The AudioPlayer object to load an audio file into.
